item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for * KAYAKERS and anyone else interested*

What: SUBSTITUTE KAYAK EVENT : Food & WINE LUNCH at GOUVEIA VINYARD

When: October 5, 2008 2:00 PM

Where: Click the link below to find out!

Meetup Description: Hi Everyone,
A long time ago i had a few MEETUPS here and everyone liked it.


im thinking we just get pizza or snacks..whatever, it really dosent matter..

OK SINCE THIS IS A REAL LAST MINUTE substitute event THING, PLEASE RSVP ONLY IF YOU ARE SURE YOU ARE GOING SO WE wont go all the way and get things and no one is there..


The Vineyard has a Wine Tasting Area, and a Sales Area along with a small area supplying FREE cheeze and crackers if you are cheap skate.


Yes, sometimes there is a party here and its just the way things are. I don't have a back up location yet however, in some ways it adds to the experience.


So what i would like to do on this colder and not so nice out day is to do a little lunch and wine afternoon.

Look at the interior and the other info from their website:

www.gouveiavinyards.com




Hours and Directions

Going North on I-91
Take Exit 14, Woodhouse Avenue. Turn left onto Woodhouse Avenue. Turn right onto South Airline Road. Turn right onto East Center Street. Turn right onto Whirlwind Hill Road. The winery is approximately half a mile on the right.
Going South on I-91
Take Exit 14, East Center Street. Turn left onto East Center Street. Turn right onto Whirlwind Hill Road.
The winery is approximately half a mile on the right.


Hours
Friday 11:00AM - 8:00PM
Saturday 11:00AM - 8:00PM
Sunday 11:00AM - 6:00PM
Open All Year
Contact Us
1339 Whirlwind Hill Rd
Wallingford, CT 06492
(203) 265-5526

Learn more here:
http://friends.meetup...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Forever Young sign on the table

item.name: Backup/Substitute Kayak Event, Pizza, snacks and Wine at Gouvia vinyard.
